description:
Takamachi Nanoha is a 3rd grade student who`s one of the few people on Earth capable of using magic. For this reason she hears the telepathic cry for help from a mage, Yuuno, being attacked and comes to rescue. Through this event Nanoha is dragged in the world of partially forgotten technology so advanced that it resembles magic.
In her quest to help Yuuno she crosses path with a black mage around her own age who has a similar objective to Nanoha`s and even though they are enemies, Nanoha wants to befriend her.
Nanoha is the youngest child in a family of five and in the begging of the first series she has two friends she has known for few years, both being somewhat egocentric and spoiled and also very rich. They also go to the same prep-school.
name: Takamachi Nanoha
